entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C

Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
